Description: We are hiring a Hairstylist for one of our clients in Doha.Candidates who have the required qualification and good experience may apply.Skills
Skills:
Minimum 3 years of experience.
Excellent skills in hair treatments, blowdry hair color, hair wash, and hairstyles.
Experienced in various coloring techniques.
Knowledge of a wide range of haircuts suitable for all hair lengths.
Familiarity with hair treatment products and services like keratin, rebounding, smoothening, protein, etc.
Must have photos/videos of previous work.
Nationality: Filipino
With a transferable visa and valid QID/NOC
Residing in Qatar
